医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
关于辅助生活需要了解什么您是否对辅助生活设施是什么以及它与疗养院有何不同感到困惑？您预计需要支付什么费用？这是针对老年人的此类住房的指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/What-to-know-about-assistance-living.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/What-to-know-about-assistance-living.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e42574f8-2353-43a0-9cd0-d3df0a59b38d Mon, 20 Nov 2023 06:48:10 -0500 What to know about assisted living
美国军方表示国家安全取决于“永远的化学品”国防部依赖数百种甚至数千种武器和产品，例如制服、电池和微电子产品，其中含有 PFAS，这是一种与严重健康状况有关的化学物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/US-military-says-national-security-depends-on-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/US-military-says-national-security-depends-on-e28098forever-chemicalse28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3884557-2116-47ae-9253-918e3e346bc1 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 06:46:38 -0500 US military says national security depends on ‘forever chemicals’
额外费用推动辅助生活利润对于数十万无法再独立生活的婴儿潮一代来说，辅助生活中心已成为一个有吸引力的退休选择，为疗养院的制度感觉提供了一种令人愉悦的替代选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Extra-fees-drive-assistance-living-profits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Extra-fees-drive-assistance-living-profits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc3278b0-02a0-4511-ab02-7602267e7211 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 06:43:44 -0500 Extra fees drive assisted living profits
新型抗抑郁药 zuranolone 可有效缓解抑郁和焦虑症状zuranolone 治疗重度抑郁症 (MDD) 的功效和安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Novel-antidepressant-zuranolone- effective-in-alleviating-depression-and-anxiety-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Novel-antidepressant-zuranolone- effective-in-alleviating-depression-and-anxiety-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=268adc61-f0cd-4200-b1ed-6a0ff0f0cdb8 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 06:39:00 -0500 Novel antidepressant zuranolone effective in alleviating depression and anxiety symptoms
新研究将酒精和白面包与结直肠癌风险增加联系起来139 种饮食因素与结直肠癌 (CRC) 风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/New-study-links-alcohol-and-white-bread-to-increased-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/New-study-links-alcohol-and-white-bread-to-increased-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c5360dd1-832b-41bb-a7cb-826282eb2cc1 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 06:15:00 -0500 New study links alcohol and white bread to increased colorectal cancer risk
MHRA 将两种囊性纤维化药物的许可期限延长至 2 至 5 岁儿童药品和保健品监管局 (MHRA) 今天（2023 年 11 月 15 日）延长了囊性纤维化药物 Kaftrio（ivacaftor、tezacaftor 和 elexacaftor）和 Kalydeco（ivacaftor）用于 2 至 5 岁儿童的许可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/MHRA-extends-the-license-of-two-cystic-Fiberosis-drugs-for-children-ages-two-to- Five-years-old。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/MHRA-extends-the-license-of-two-cystic-Fiberosis-drugs-for-children-ages-two-to- Five-years-old。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3cb0b4c-ae92-4166-9641-f996ab6927b3 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:32:00 -0500 MHRA extends the license of two cystic fibrosis drugs for children aged two to five years old
Tune Therapeutics 推出治疗慢性乙型肝炎病毒感染的潜在治疗方法表观基因组编辑先驱公司 Tune Therapeutics 宣布正在研究一种新的、具有潜在治愈性的方法来治疗慢性乙型肝炎病毒感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Tune-Therapeutics-unveils-pottially-curative-approach-to-treating-chronic-HBV-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Tune-Therapeutics-unveils-pottially-curative-approach-to-treating-chronic-HBV-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebbacdf3-9f18-4a48-a466-f16419b041c4 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:27:00 -0500 Tune Therapeutics unveils potentially curative approach to treating chronic HBV infection
Almirall 和 Absci 合作开发人工智能设计的皮肤病疗法专注于医学皮肤病学的全球生物制药公司 Almirall SA 和人工智能药物生成公司 Absci Corporation 今天宣布建立药物发现合作伙伴关系，旨在开发和商业化人工智能设计的疗法，以对抗慢性和衰弱性皮肤病。此次合作将 Absci 的 Integrated Drug Creation™ 平台与 Almirall 的皮肤病学专业知识相结合，旨在为患者提供改变生活的药物，标志着人工智能药物创造又向前迈进了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Almirall-and-Absci-partner-to-develop-AI-Designed-therapeutics-for-dermatological-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Almirall-and-Absci-partner-to-develop-AI-Designed-therapeutics-for-dermatological-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff4cb685-2f1b-4b6c-ab71-d57365a52585 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:08:00 -0500 Almirall and Absci partner to develop AI-designed therapeutics for dermatological diseases
学者心理健康文章获得跨党派​​好评曼彻斯特大学学者发表了大量文章，探讨了心理健康状况不佳的复杂性，并提出了缓解患者困境的政策建议，受到了议会两院政治家的跨党派赞扬。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Academics-mental-health-articles-gain-cross-party-praise.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Academics-mental-health-articles-gain-cross-party-praise.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acd46ef6-e7f6-46c3-b216-e8cfa88dea1c Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:05:00 -0500 Academics' mental health articles gain cross-party praise
澳大利亚每 4 分钟就有 1 人因头部受伤而住院澳大利亚健康与福利研究所 (AIHW) 发布的一份报告显示，2020-21 年，头部受伤导致 142,000 例住院病例，相当于每 4 分钟就有 1 例住院病例。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Head-injuries-lead-to-1-hospitalization-every-4-minutes-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231120/Head-injuries-lead-to-1-hospitalization-every-4-minutes-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fba4e561-aa27-47a9-a25e-da7172f94aa4 Mon, 20 Nov 2023 05:00:00 -0500 Head injuries lead to 1 hospitalization every 4 minutes in Australia
